entry.string: cd devops-deployment-stm2.5 sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/smartlog-optimization.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/smartlog-optimization@sha256:f24cd8698880d17068bfbfb410822edfc18abfa96bcc76d59514e8f0f73d71fa+g' ./super-vrp/develop_v3-deliveree/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./super-vrp/develop_v3-deliveree/.argocd-source.yaml for file in ./super-vrp/develop_v3-deliveree/deploy*.yaml; do sed -i "s/\(date:\s*\)'[^']*'/\1'1680830020'/" "$file";git add "$file";done
